title: Worshipper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, preach to a non-Partisan player. The next night, they may choose to refuse you, shelter you, or join your ranks.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target refuses you, you will not be able to preach to them again.
- If your target shelters you, you will gain Basic defense for the night.
- If your target joins your ranks, you will attack them.

desc:
Post 2444
*Those who revere the sun will bask in its glory for all eternity.*
Roleblock and redirect immune
